name: Aurora Camping Light
description: Rechargeable LED camping lamp with adjustable brightness and a convenient hanging hook, perfect for lighting up any campsite.
features: Up to 20 hours of continuous battery life
3 light modes: Warm, Cool, and Mixed

name: TrailMaster Flashlight
description: A compact and ultra-bright tactical flashlight designed for hiking, emergencies, and everyday carry.
features: Dual light modes: Focused Spot & Wide Flood

name: Nova Portable Lantern
description: A versatile, foldable LED lantern with a solar charging option and a magnetic base for hands-free use.
features: Dual charging: Solar panel and USB input
Perfect for camping, power outages, and emergency kits
Can be used as a power bank to charge devices

name: Pathfinder Headlamp
description: Lightweight, rechargeable, with 5 distinct light modes including a red light for night vision.
features: 5 modes: High, Medium, Low, Strobe, Red

name: GoBeam LED Strip
description: Flexible and magnetic, this portable LED strip is perfect for illuminating tents, awnings, and workspaces.
features: Strong magnetic backing and hanging loops
USB-powered for use with any power bank

name: SolarFlare Emergency Light
description: A rugged, solar-powered emergency light with a built-in power bank to charge your essential devices.
